title: Handbook of Girls' and Women's Psychological Health. Gender and Well-Being Across the Life-Span. Edited by J. Worell and C. D. Goodheart. (Pp. 528; £35.99; ISBN 0-19- 516203-X hb.) Oxford University Press: New York. 2006.
